title: Invalid Arguement Exception
body:
Hello, running Psalm I get an `Invalid Aguement Exception`

```
vagrant@civi:/srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm$ php ./vendor/bin/psalm 
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE  60 / 467 (13%)
EEEEEEPHP Fatal error:  Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for crm_core_bao_customquery in /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:47
Stack trace:
#0 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/ClassLikes.php(1387): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('crm_core_bao_cu...')
#1 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Type/Reconciler.php(2868): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\ClassLikes->getConstantsForClass('crm_core_bao_cu...', 1024)
#2 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Type/Reconciler.php(173): Psalm\Type\Reconciler::getValueForKey(Object(Psalm\Codebase), 'CRM_Core_BAO_Cu...', Array, Array, Object(Psalm\CodeLocation))
#3 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Block/IfAnalyzer.php(299): Psalm\Type\Reconciler::recon in /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php on line 47

Fatal error: Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for crm_core_bao_customquery in /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:47
Stack trace:
#0 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/ClassLikes.php(1387): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('crm_core_bao_cu...')
#1 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Type/Reconciler.php(2868): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\ClassLikes->getConstantsForClass('crm_core_bao_cu...', 1024)
#2 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Type/Reconciler.php(173): Psalm\Type\Reconciler::getValueForKey(Object(Psalm\Codebase), 'CRM_Core_BAO_Cu...', Array, Array, Object(Psalm\CodeLocation))
#3 /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Block/IfAnalyzer.php(299): Psalm\Type\Reconciler::recon in /srv/www/d7-master/web/sites/all/modules/civicrm/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php on line 47
```
Any help on fixing this?
